lead_paragraph: PLAYER With his controversial transfer finally behind him, the Argentine striker Carlos Tévez is set to make his debut for Manchester United in today’s English Premier League match at Portsmouth. Tévez, 23, is likely to start in place of Wayne Rooney, 21, who broke his left foot in Sunday’s season opener against Reading.
